summary: Diff adds a new bottom tab navigation component and wires it into ReelHome (including empty-feed state), plus adds corresponding CSS. However, the wheel navigation components/hooks appear to still exist (they are modified, not removed), so full removal of wheel-based navigation and its hooks/styling is not clearly completed from the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the wheel-based navigation mechanic from the app, including its UI, hooks, and styling, so no wheel navigation is rendered or referenced anywhere in the reel experience.
missing_requirements.reason: The wheel navigation files still exist and are shown as modified rather than removed; the diff summary does not demonstrate that WheelNavScroller and the wheel-scroller hook are no longer referenced anywhere, nor that wheel-specific CSS/classes are fully removed/unreferenced.
